abstracts.cdata!:
This second additional credit for the
            Madagascar for the Community Development Project will
            finance the costs associated with the scaling-up of the
            activities implemented by the social investment fund (Fonds
            d'Intervention pour le Developpment or FID), and
            supported by the project. To a lesser extent, the additional
            credit would also allow for the completion of the
            reconstruction of infrastructure damaged during the 2004
            cyclones. The projects objective remains to improve the use
            of and satisfaction with project-supported social and
            economic services provided amongst participating rural and
            urban communities.
